articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Putin says Russia does not reject talks with Ukraine - Reuters
articles.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin said on Saturday that an African initiative could be a basis for peace in Ukraine but that Ukrainian attacks made it hard to realise.
articles.content:
July 29 (Reuters) - Russian President Vladimir Putin said on Saturday that an African initiative could be a basis for peace in Ukraine but that Ukrainian attacks made it hard to realise.
He was spea… [+1252 chars]

articles.author: Express News Service
articles.title: ‘Exiled’ Russian mercenary boss Prigozhin hails Niger coup, touts services - The Indian Express
articles.description: Niger's coup leaders declared General Abdourahamane Tiani as the new head of state on Friday days after saying they had ousted President Mohamed Bazoum in the seventh military takeover in West and Central Africa in less than three years.
articles.content: Wagner mercenary boss Yevgeny Prigozhin, who remains active despite leading a failed mutiny against the Russian army’s top brass last month, has hailed Niger’s military coup as good news and offered … [+4800 chars]
